backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profile management (get/save), game catalog CRUD operations with admin-only add/update/delete, public queries for games by platform/sale status, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: updating WhatsApp contact number to 918757242995 in GameCard.tsx and adding a real-time search bar with icon in GameCatalog.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the Dragon Games Store application with white/black/blue theme.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, 'Dragon Games Store' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component using TanStack Router to define routes for home page (/) and admin page (/admin) with shared Header/Footer layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component displaying Dragon Games Store description, 3 years experience, 5,600+ customers, platform availability (PC/PS5/PS4/Xbox), and value propositions with Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameForm.ts: Dialog form component for adding/editing games with fields for name, price, platform, description, image upload with progress tracking, trailer URL, and sale status toggle using shadcn/ui components.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameList.ts: Admin game management component displaying all games in a grid with edit/delete actions, using AdminGameForm dialog for editing and AlertDialog for delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice with current year and 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Displays a game card with image, price, platform badge, description, optional trailer video, and action buttons (Buy Now via WhatsApp for users, Edit/Delete for admins).
frontend/src/components/GameCatalog.tsx: Renders a searchable catalog of games in horizontal scrollable rows of 4 cards each, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Site header with logo, navigation, login/logout button, and conditional Admin Panel button for admin users.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin role, displaying appropriate messages or rendering children if authorized.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user authentication operations: fetching caller role, admin status, and user profile, plus saving profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for game CRUD operations: fetching all games, by ID, by platform, on-sale games, and mutations for add/update/delete.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using white background with black text, blue primary colors, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Protected admin panel page with header, add game button, and components for listing and managing the game catalog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying AboutUs and GameCatalog components, with conditional UserProfileSetup dialog for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Dragon Games Store as a digital gaming marketplace with white/black theme, WhatsApp purchase flow, and existing features for game catalog, admin interface, and search functionality.
